title: help with your store
body: Anyone know anything about the your store stuff

replies.body: Were there any questions about My Shop you had specifically? I'd be more than happy to help clear anything up ^_^

1) When will it be back online :(
2) Is it still 6 sales?
3) When its back online where are we gon find it?
4) What was/were the problem(s) that made you as Riot to disable it temporarily?
5) Is MyShop Still going to be available every big event like Snowdown/Harrowing etc ?
